component.name: Li-ion Capacitor
component.purpose: Storing charge used by the mote.

properties.capacitance: High capacitance compared to a capacitor.
properties.operatingTemp: Operating temperatures ranging from (-20-70) degrees celcius
properties.selfDischarge: low self-discharge(less than 5% voltage drop at 25 degrees celcius).

component.description: A lithium-ion capacitor (LIC) is a hybrid type of capacitor classified as a type of supercapacitor. Activated carbon is typically used as the cathode. The anode of the LIC consists of carbon material which is pre-doped with lithium ions.
